channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15671] Add per-table metrics on memstore, storefile and regionsize
item.summary: Add per-table metrics on memstore, storefile and regionsize

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Thanks Enis Soztutar for reviewing!. Uploaded a patch.

Please fix this: 


+  String TABLE_SIZE_DESC = "The total size of the table to a region server";

It should read "Total size of the table in the region server". Otherwise looks good.

-1 overall
